citations.narrative:
This is a search inspection.
The applicant currently sells regulated mammals (Bengal cats and Asian Leopard cats) without a valid USDA license. The
business website also advertises nationwide shipping. The applicant was previously informed through two pre-license
phone conversations on May 17, 2022 and December 9, 2022 that a license is required to sell or negotiate the sale of
exotic mammals, and in the case of domestic pet species, a license is required to engage in non-direct sales unless
certain exclusions apply.
A valid license is necessary to protect the health and well-being of the animals and to comply with the Animal Welfare Act
and Regulations. The facility needs to obtain a USDA license or discontinue regulated activities.
No regulated activities may be conducted until USDA license/registration is obtained.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the applicant.
n

narrative:
2.1(a)(1) 
   
Requirements and application. 
This is a search inspection. 
The applicant currently sells regulated mammals (Bengal cats and Asian Leopard cats) without a valid USDA license. The 
business website also advertises nationwide shipping. The applicant was previously informed through two pre-license 
phone conversations on May 17, 2022 and December 9, 2022 that a license is required to sell or negotiate the sale of 
exotic mammals, and in the case of domestic pet species, a license is required to engage in non-direct sales unless 
certain exclusions apply.  
 
A valid license is necessary to protect the health and well-being of the animals and to comply with the Animal Welfare Act 
and Regulations. The facility needs to obtain a USDA license or discontinue regulated activities. 
 
No regulated activities may be conducted until USDA license/registration is obtained. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the applicant.
